titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-1006, by Mr. Reynolds.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 320.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 651.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 190 (Roll no. 559).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/26/2000--Introduced. Makes it in order at any time on October 26, 2000, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules relating to specified measures.
